query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT s.id) as total_sessions_remaining,
  MIN(msg_count.message_count) as min_messages,
  MAX(msg_count.message_count) as max_messages,
  AVG(msg_count.message_count) as avg_messages
FROM sessions s
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT sessionId, COUNT(*) as message_count
  FROM messages
  GROUP BY sessionId
) msg_count ON s.id = msg_count.sessionId;

SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT s.id) as total_sessions_remaining,
  MIN(msg_count.message_count) as min_messages,
  MAX(msg_count.message_count) as max_messages,
  AVG(msg_count.message_count) as avg_messages
FROM sessions s
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT sessionId, COUNT(*) as message_count
  FROM messages
  GROUP BY sessionId
) msg_count ON s.id = msg_count.sessionId;
